item.description:
Help us hand out hundreds of pieces of school supplies! We gathered over $300 that went to tons of backpacks, pens, paper, crayons, markers, and lots more. And now it all wil be going to the people who need it most - the Worcester area residents going through a tough time in this rough economy.

Help us put some smiles on some kids' faces and give them the tools they need to learn.

We will be there as early as 8am for setup, but feel free to show up at 9 or later. We can use all the help we can get!
item.name: Education Drive
